text: The Poison is the debut studio album by Bullet for My Valentine. The album was released on February 14, 2006. ==Track listing== # "Intro (featuring Apocalyptica)" – 2:22 # "Her Voice Resides" – 4:17 # "4 Words (To Choke Upon)" – 3:43 # "Tears Don't Fall" – 5:48 # "Suffocating Under Words of Sorrow (What Can I Do)" – 3:35 # "Hit the Floor" – 3:30 # "All These Things I Hate (Revolve Around Me)" – 3:45 # "Room 409" – 4:01 # "The Poison" – 3:39 # "10 Years Today" – 3:55 # "Cries in Vain" – 3:56 # "Spit You Out" – 4:08 # "The End" – 6:48 ==References== Category:2006 albums
title: The Poison
